announcement.title: Meet Catnip â€” the new visual programming language in ct.js!
announcement.description:
Catnip was made from 0 for ct.js and is now the third coding option for your projects. The language is available in the New project form, and can also be used in all projects with the Script asset type. Docs now contain a new Learn Catnip section and Catnip code examples in tutorials
Ct.js v5 brought other features, too â€” read in the full changelog.

games.title: Crazy One (open for playtests!)
games.author: tariq
games.description: A game where you try to break through a very heavy hatch by dumping everything you find on it while pew-pewing monsters in procedurally generated levels. Different heroes and weapons to choose, andâ€¦ pills??

games.title: Triverse
games.author: Thomas
games.description: ðŸ”ºTriverseðŸ”º is a puzzle game: make geometric shapes composed of triangles and hexagons.

games.title: Hollow Floor
games.author: Ahmed Khalifa, Pete Gresser
games.description: Hollow Floor is an exploration-based single-sitting Metroidvania inspired by VVVVVV and REDDER. Hollow Floor is a relaxed game that is full of secrets and hard challenges that can be tackled at any moment in the game or completely ignored. Checkout the demo and Wishlist on Steam!

games.title: CoMiGo and the Vacation of Fusions
games.author: Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych
games.description: Explore the sea, fuse elements to shape your own island, and take selfies!

learn.title: Learn Catnip
learn.author: CoMiGo
learn.description: The new section in official docs is a short introduction to the new programming language. Learn about block and variable types, how to work with copies, and how to construct complex conditions and work with loops.

learn.title: Visual scripting in ct.js â€” introduction
learn.author: William MC / Exceptional 3D tutorials
learn.description: New updates to ct.js game engine opens up a hole new world of possibilities for visual coders.

learn.title: Making text and button in ct.js using visual scripting (Catnip)
learn.author: William MC / Exceptional 3D tutorials
learn.description: Using buttons and text in ct.js for game development.

learn.title: Making Games: Platformer
learn.author: Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych, Firecakes
learn.description: In this tutorial, we will create a small platformer with diamonds, checkpoints, moving platforms, and traps! You will learn how to detect collisions, use them to create a side-view movement, and how to manipulate sprites and move the player between levels.
